body: I do not think silently converting None to NaN would be a good idea in general. At least from my personal experience the check to prevent Nones from being silently converted to tensors has saved me many hours of debugging weird issues.
body_html: I do not think silently converting None to NaN would be a good idea in general. At least from my personal experience the check to prevent Nones from being silently converted to tensors has saved me many hours of debugging weird issues.
